Index: 
===================================================================
--- 
+++ 
@@ -0,0 +1,65 @@
+{
+  "name": "envguard-monorepo",
+  "version": "0.0.0",
+  "private": true,
+  "description": "Local-first secret management for developers",
+  "license": "MIT",
+  "type": "commonjs",
+  "author": "Your Name",
+  "engines": {
+    "node": ">=18.0.0",
+    "pnpm": ">=8.0.0"
+  },
+  "packageManager": "pnpm@8.15.0",
+  "scripts": {
+    "dev": "pnpm --filter @envguard/cli dev",
+    "build": "pnpm -r --stream build",
+    "test": "pnpm -r --stream test",
+    "test:coverage": "pnpm -r --stream test:coverage",
+    "test:watch": "pnpm -r --stream test:watch",
+    "lint": "eslint . --max-warnings 0",
+    "lint:errors": "eslint . --quiet",
+    "lint:fix": "eslint . --fix",
+    "format": "prettier --write \"**/*.{ts,tsx,js,jsx,json,md,yaml,yml}\"",
+    "format:check": "prettier --check \"**/*.{ts,tsx,js,jsx,json,md,yaml,yml}\"",
+    "typecheck": "pnpm -r --stream typecheck",
+    "clean": "pnpm -r --stream clean",
+    "clean:all": "pnpm -r --stream clean && pnpm -r exec rm -rf dist && rm -rf node_modules",
+    "prepare": "husky install",
+    "changeset": "changeset",
+    "version-packages": "changeset version",
+    "release": "pnpm build && changeset publish",
+    "pre-commit": "lint-staged",
+    "validate": "pnpm lint:errors && pnpm typecheck && pnpm test"
+  },
+  "devDependencies": {
+    "@changesets/cli": "^2.27.1",
+    "@commitlint/cli": "^18.6.0",
+    "@commitlint/config-conventional": "^18.6.0",
+    "@eslint/eslintrc": "^3.3.1",
+    "@stylistic/eslint-plugin": "^5.4.0",
+    "@stylistic/eslint-plugin-ts": "^4.4.1",
+    "@types/node": "^20.11.5",
+    "@typescript-eslint/eslint-plugin": "^8.46.1",
+    "@typescript-eslint/parser": "^8.46.1",
+    "eslint": "^8.57.1",
+    "eslint-config-airbnb-base": "^15.0.0",
+    "eslint-config-airbnb-typescript": "^18.0.0",
+    "eslint-config-prettier": "^9.1.2",
+    "eslint-import-resolver-typescript": "^3.6.1",
+    "eslint-plugin-import": "^2.32.0",
+    "eslint-plugin-prettier": "^5.5.4",
+    "eslint-plugin-promise": "^6.6.0",
+    "eslint-plugin-security": "^2.1.1",
+    "eslint-plugin-sonarjs": "^0.23.0",
+    "eslint-plugin-unicorn": "^50.0.1",
+    "eslint-plugin-vitest": "^0.5.4",
+    "husky": "^8.0.3",
+    "lint-staged": "^15.2.0",
+    "prettier": "^3.2.4",
+    "tsup": "^8.0.1",
+    "tsx": "^4.7.0",
+    "typescript": "^5.3.3",
+    "vitest": "^1.2.1"
+  }
+}

Index:

--- 
+++ 
@@ -0,0 +1,59 @@
+{
+  "name": "envguard-monorepo",
+  "version": "0.0.0",
+  "private": true,
+  "description": "Local-first secret management for developers",
+  "license": "MIT",
+  "type": "module",
+  "author": "Your Name",
+  "engines": {
+    "node": ">=18.0.0",
+    "pnpm": ">=8.0.0"
+  },
+  "packageManager": "pnpm@8.15.0",
+  "scripts": {
+    "dev": "pnpm --filter @envguard/cli dev",
+    "build": "pnpm -r --stream build",
+    "test": "pnpm -r --stream test",
+    "test:coverage": "pnpm -r --stream test:coverage",
+    "test:watch": "pnpm -r --stream test:watch",
+    "lint": "eslint . --max-warnings 0 --config eslint.config.mjs",
+    "lint:errors": "eslint . --quiet --config eslint.config.mjs",
+    "lint:fix": "eslint . --fix",
+    "format": "prettier --write \"**/*.{ts,tsx,js,jsx,json,md,yaml,yml}\"",
+    "format:check": "prettier --check \"**/*.{ts,tsx,js,jsx,json,md,yaml,yml}\"",
+    "typecheck": "pnpm -r --stream typecheck",
+    "clean": "pnpm -r --stream clean",
+    "clean:all": "pnpm -r --stream clean && pnpm -r exec rm -rf dist && rm -rf node_modules",
+    "prepare": "husky install",
+    "changeset": "changeset",
+    "version-packages": "changeset version",
+    "release": "pnpm build && changeset publish",
+    "pre-commit": "lint-staged",
+    "docs:generate": "typedoc --options typedoc.json",
+    "docs:watch": "typedoc --watch --options typedoc.json",
+    "docs:dev": "pnpm exec concurrently \"pnpm run docs:watch\" \"vitepress dev docs --open\"",
+    "docs:build": "pnpm run docs:generate && vitepress build docs",
+    "validate": "pnpm lint:errors && pnpm typecheck && pnpm test",
+    "docs:preview": "vitepress preview docs"
+  },
+  "devDependencies": {
+    "@types/node": "^20.19.22",
+    "@typescript-eslint/eslint-plugin": "^8.46.1",
+    "@typescript-eslint/parser": "^8.46.1",
+    "eslint": "^8.57.1",
+    "globals": "^16.4.0",
+    "concurrently": "^8.2.2",
+    "husky": "^8.0.3",
+    "lint-staged": "^15.5.2",
+    "prettier": "^3.6.2",
+    "tsup": "^8.5.0",
+    "tsx": "^4.20.6",
+    "typedoc": "^0.28.14",
+    "typedoc-plugin-markdown": "^4.9.0",
+    "typedoc-vitepress-theme": "^1.1.2",
+    "typescript": "^5.9.3",
+    "vitepress": "^1.6.4",
+    "vitest": "^1.6.1"
+  }
+}

commits.content:
{
  "name": "envguard-monorepo",
  "version": "0.0.0",
  "private": true,
  "description": "Local-first secret management for developers",
  "license": "MIT",
  "author": "Your Name",
  "engines": {
    "node": ">=18.0.0",
    "pnpm": ">=8.0.0"
  },
  "packageManager": "pnpm@8.15.0",
  "scripts": {
    "dev": "pnpm --filter @envguard/cli dev",
    "build": "pnpm -r --stream build",
    "test": "pnpm -r --stream test",
    "test:coverage": "pnpm -r --stream test:coverage",
    "test:watch": "pnpm -r --stream test:watch",
    "lint": "eslint . --ext .ts,.tsx,.js,.jsx --max-warnings 0",
    "lint:fix": "eslint . --ext .ts,.tsx,.js,.jsx --fix",
    
    "format": "prettier --write \"**/*.{ts,tsx,js,jsx,json,md,yaml,yml}\"",
    "format:check": "prettier --check \"**/*.{ts,tsx,js,jsx,json,md,yaml,yml}\"",
    "typecheck": "pnpm -r --stream typecheck",
    "clean": "pnpm -r --stream clean && rm -rf node_modules",
    "prepare": "husky install",
    "changeset": "changeset",
    "version-packages": "changeset version",
    "release": "pnpm build && changeset publish",
    "pre-commit": "lint-staged",
    "validate": "pnpm lint && pnpm typecheck && pnpm test"
  },
  "devDependencies": {
    "eslint-import-resolver-typescript": "^3.6.1",
    "@changesets/cli": "^2.27.1",
    "@commitlint/cli": "^18.6.0",
    "@commitlint/config-conventional": "^18.6.0",
    "@types/node": "^20.11.5",
    "@typescript-eslint/eslint-plugin": "^6.19.0",
    "@typescript-eslint/parser": "^6.19.0",
    "eslint": "^8.56.0",
    "eslint-config-airbnb-base": "^15.0.0",
    "eslint-config-airbnb-typescript": "^17.1.0",
    "eslint-config-prettier": "^9.1.0",
    "eslint-plugin-import": "^2.29.1",
    "eslint-plugin-prettier": "^5.1.3",
    "eslint-plugin-promise": "^6.1.1",
    "eslint-plugin-security": "^2.1.0",
    "eslint-plugin-sonarjs": "^0.23.0",
    "eslint-plugin-unicorn": "^50.0.1",
    "husky": "^8.0.3",
    "lint-staged": "^15.2.0",
    "prettier": "^3.2.4",
    "tsup": "^8.0.1",
    "tsx": "^4.7.0",
    "typescript": "^5.3.3",
    "vitest": "^1.2.1"
  }
}
